original_text:
when he gave the sea its boundary
    so the waters would not overstep his command,
and when he marked out the foundations of the earth.
korean_text: 바다의 한계를 정하여 물이 명령을 거스르지 못하게 하시며 또 땅의 기초를 정하실 때에

sentences.original_text: when he gave the sea its boundary
so the waters would not overstep his command
sentences.korean_translation: 물들이 그의 명령을 넘지 못하게 하려고

sentences.original_text: and when he marked out the foundations of the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그가 땅의 기초를 정하실 때
